inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: Version of Yarn to install
inputs.helpMarkDown: A version or version range that specifies the Yarn version to make available on the path. Use x as a wildcard. See the [list of available Yarn versions](https://github.com/yarnpkg/yarn/releases).

inputs.name: checkLatest
inputs.label: Always download the latest matching version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Always check for and download the latest available version of Yarn which satisfies the version spec. This option will also always incur download time, even if the selected version of NuGet is already cached.

Enabling this option could cause unexpected build breaks when a new version of Yarn is released.
